name.baseName: Preparation and firing ; Sanitary ceramics ; Porcelain stone, feldspar, quartz, etc. ; Tunnel kiln (natural gas) ; All sizes; NESPS2
制备烧成 ; 卫生陶瓷 ; 瓷石、长石、石英等 ; 隧道窑（天然气） ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述工业过程是为制备和烧制卫生陶瓷，包括使用天然气驱动的隧道窑烧制的瓷石、长石和石英。该过程适用于所有规模的陶瓷，并设计了PM2.5至PM10颗粒污染的尾气处理技术，通过湿式静电沉降或直接排放，二氧化硫通过使用钠碱法或直接排放，以及通过SNCR或直接排放处理氮氧化物。然而，此数据集并未提供有关废气和废水污染的具体处理技术。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码30,三级代码307.0,四级代码3072文件，在完整版文件中第829页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为卫生陶瓷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isOthers (wet electrostatic precipitation)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是其他（湿式电除尘），其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数(小时/年)、企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisOthers (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是其他（钠碱法），其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数(小时/年)、企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是直排。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是直排。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisSNCR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是选择性非催化还原法（SNCR），其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数(小时/年)、企业正。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是直排。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标废气量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标废水量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
